When the veteran Congressman Brady Cam (Will Ferrell) commits a major gaffe public before an election period, two very rich CEOs plan to put a rival candidate to gain influence in the district of North Carolina, where the race will occur. The chosen man is innocent Marty Huggins (Zach Galifianakis), director of the Center for Tourism site. At first, Marty seems to be the most unlikely, but with the support of his new benefactors, a bold campaign manager and political connections of his family, he soon becomes a candidate with whom the charismatic Cam worry.
